attributes.action: i want VAR for the WSL(woman's super league)
attributes.additional_details: they have it for men's football and the reason they don't have it is because they insisted there are “significant technical, operational and logistical challenges. I don't understand why there are these challenges for woman's and not for men.
attributes.background: i want parliament to put pressure on the football association to have VAR for all WSL games

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about introducing VAR for the Women's Super League are a matter for the organisers and relevant sporting authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
